#text=Last weekend I took a bike ride around my neighborhood .
#text=When I got back home , I noticed that my front tire looked low .
#text=I looked at the tire and realized there was a nail stuck in it .
#text=Then removed the tire from the bike .
#text=Inside the tire was a bike tube .
#text=The air goes in the bike tube , but it was leaking because of the hole the nail put in it .
#text=I found my patch kit , and glued a bike tube patch over the hole .
#text=I pumped and pumped until the tube was inflated .
#text=Afterwards , I put the bike tube in water to see if there were any air bubbles .
#text=Air bubbles in the water mean there 's still a leak .
#text=Luckily for me , it was no longer leaking air !
#text=I put the tire back over the top of the bike tube and put the tire back on my bicycle .
#text=I looked at it carefully , then hopped on for another ride around the neighborhood , this time avoiding any nails .
